252:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān dhyānābhyāsopacitasya kuśalasya karmaṇo vipākaprabhāvād brahmaloke janma pratilebhe|
252:4: tasya tanmahadapi dhyānaviśeṣādhigataṃ brāhmaṃ sukhaṃ pūrvajanmasu kāruṇyaparicayānnaiva parahitakaraṇavyāpāranirutsukaṃ manaścakāra|
252:6: dhyānasukhairapi tu satāṃ na tiraskriyate parahitecchā||1||
252:7: atha kadācitsa mahātmā karuṇāśrayabhūtaṃ vividhadūḥkhavyasanaśatopasṛṣṭamutkliṣṭavyāpādavihiṃsākāmadhātuṃ kāmadhātuṃ vyalokayan dadarśa videharājamaṅgadinnaṃ nāma kumitrasaṃparkadoṣādasanmanaskāraparicayācca mithyādṛṣṭigahane paribhramantam|
252:9: kutaḥ śubhaśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipāka ityevaṃ sa niścayamupetya praśāntadharmakriyautsukyaḥ pradānaśīlādisukṛtapratipattivimukhaḥ saṃrūḍhaparibhavabuddhirdhārmikeṣvaśraddhārūkṣamatirdharmaśāstreṣu parihāsacittaḥ parlokakathāsu śithilavinayopacāragauravabahumānaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇeṣu kāmasukhaparāyaṇo babhūva|
252:10: śubhāśubhaṃ karma sukhāsukhodayaṃ dhruvaṃ paratreti virūḍhaniścayaḥ|
252:11: apāsya pāpa yatate śubhāśrayo yatheṣṭamaśraddhatayā tu gamyate||2||
252:12: atha sa mahātmā devarṣistasya rājñastena dṛṣṭivyasanopanipātenāpāyikena lokānarthākarabhūtena samāvarjitānukampastasya rājño viṣayasukhākalitamateḥ śrīmati pravivikte vimānadeśe'vatiṣṭhamānasyābhijvalan brahmalokātpurastātsamavatatāra|
252:13: atha sa rājā tamagniskandhamiva jvalantaṃ vidyutsamūhamiva cāvabhāsamānaṃ dinakarakīraṇasaṃghātamiva ca parayā dīptyā virocamānamabhivīkṣya tattejasābhibhūtamatiḥ sasaṃbhramaḥ prāñjalirena pratyutthāya sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇa ityuvāca-
252:14: karoti te bhūriva saṃparigrahaṃ nabho'pi padmopamapāda pādayoḥ|
252:15: vibhāsi saurīmiva codvahan prabhāṃ vilocanānandanarūpa ko bhavān||3||
252:21: ityukte sa rājā svāgatādipriyavacanapuraḥsaraṃ pādyārghyasatkāramasmai samupahṛtya savismayamenamabhivīkṣamāṇa uvāca-āścaryarūpaḥ khalu te maharṣe ṛddhiprabhāvaḥ|
252:25: dhyānasya śīlasya ca nirmalasya varasya caivendriyasaṃvarasya|
252:30: rājovāca-kathaṃ punaridaṃ mārṣa śakyamasmābhirapi śraddhātuṃ syāt ?
252:34: pratyakṣarūpaḥ paraloka eṣa mā te'tra saṃdehajaḍā matirbhūt||7||
252:35: jātismarāḥ santi ca tatra tatra dhyānābhiyogātsmṛtipāṭavācca|
252:36: ato'pi lokaḥ parato'numeyaḥ sākṣyaṃ ca nanvatra kṛtaṃ mayaiva||8||
252:38: ādyā hi yā garbhagatasya buddhiḥ sānantaraṃ pūrvakajanmabuddheḥ||9||
252:39: jñeyāvabodhaṃ ca vadanti buddhiṃ janmādibuddherviṣayo'sti tasmāt|
252:40: na caihiko'sau nayanādyabhāvātsiddhau yadiyastu paraḥ sa lokaḥ||10||
252:41: pitryaṃ svabhāvaṃ vyatiricya dṛṣṭaḥ śīlādibhedaśca yataḥ prajānām|
252:46: abhyāsasiddhirhi paṭukaroti śikṣāgaṇaṃ karmasu teṣu teṣu||13||
252:55: yatnaśca nāsti kamale stanape tu dṛṣṭaḥ
252:57: tadevaṃ mahārāja samyagupaparīkṣamāṇena śakyametacchraddhātum-asti paraloka iti|
252:58: atha sa rājā mithyādṛṣṭiparigrahābhiniviṣṭabuddhitvādupacitapāpatvācca tāṃ paralokakathāṃ śrutvā asukhāyamāna uvāca-bho maharṣe,
252:60: grāhyaṃ mayaitaditi vā yadi manyase tvam|
252:63: atha bodhisattvastadasya prāgalbhyaparicayanirviśaṅkaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiviṣodgārabhūtamasamudācāravacanaṃ yukteneva krameṇa pratyuvāca-
252:64: ihāpi tāvaddhanasaṃpadarthinaḥ prayuñjate naiva dhanaṃ durātmani|
252:65: na ghasmare nānipuṇe na cālase gataṃ hi yattatra tadantameti tat||17||
252:66: yameva paśyanti tu savyapatrapaṃ śamābhijātaṃ vyavahāranaipuṇam|
252:67: ṛṇaṃ prayacchanti raho'pi tadvidhe tadarpaṇaṃ hyabhyudayāvahaṃ dhanam||18||
252:68: kramaśca tāvadvidha eva gamyatāmṛṇaprayoge nṛpa pāralaukike|
252:73: na caiva tārāgaṇabhūṣaṇaṃ nabhaḥ saraḥ prabuddhaiḥ kumudairivekṣyate||21||
252:74: paratra yasminnivasanti nāstikā ghanaṃ tamastatra himaśca mārutaḥ|
252:75: karoti yo'stīnyapi dārayan rujaṃ tamātmavān kaḥ praviśeddhanepsayā||22||
252:79: diśaḥ pradhāvanti tadunmumukṣayā na cāntamāyāntyaśubhasya nāyuṣaḥ||24||
252:80: ātakṣya takṣāṇa ivāpareṣāṃ gātrāni raudrā viniyamya yāmyāḥ|
252:83: na cāyānti nāśaṃdhṛtā duṣkṛtaiḥ svaistathā cāpare khaṇḍaśaśchidyamānāḥ||26||
252:91: samāni pañcāpi samāśatāni saṃcūrṇyamānā visṛjanti nāsūn||29||
252:93: pāṭyanta ūrdhvamadha eva ca kṛṣyamāṇāḥ krūrai ravairapuruṣaiḥ puruṣairyamasya||30||
252:101: kecittīkṣṇaiḥ śastravarṣaiḥ kṣatāṅgā nistvaṅmāṃsā vyālasaṃghaiḥ kriyante||33||
252:102: kecitklāntā vahnisaṃsparśatīkṣṇaṃ kṣāraṃ toyaṃ vaitaraṇyāṃ viśanti|
252:103: saṃśīryante yatra māṃsāni teṣāṃ no tu prāṇā duṣkṛtairdhāryamāṇā||35||
252:116: yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam||39||
252:120: yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam||40||
252:124: yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam||41||
252:125: prāptaṃ parābhavaṃ taṃ duḥkhāni mahānti kastadānubhavantam|
252:128: vidāryamāṇa bhṛśamārtinādinaṃ paratra kastvārhati yācituṃ dhanam||43||
252:132: viśasanairvividhaiśca sadāturaḥ kathamṛṇaṃ pratidāsyasi me tadā||45||
252:134: tāṃ nirayakathāmatibhīṣaṇāṃ samupaśrutya jātasaṃvegastyaktamithyādṛṣṭyanurāgo labdhasaṃpratyayaḥ paraloke,
252:136: niśamya tāvannareṣu yātanāṃ bhayādidaṃ vidravatīva me manaḥ|
252:137: kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na tāṃ sameyivān vitakravahnirdahatīva māṃ punaḥ||46||
252:139: tadatra me sādhugatirgatirbhavān parāyaṇaṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca me mune||47||
252:140: yathaiva me dṛṣṭitamastvayoddhṛtaṃ divākareṇeva samudyatā tamaḥ|
252:141: tathaiva mārgaṃ tvamṛṣe pracakṣva me bhajeya yenāhamito na durgatim||48||
252:142: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvignamānasamṛjūbhūtadṛṣṭiṃ dharmapratipattipātrabhūtamavekṣya piteva putramācārya iva ca śiṣyamanukampamāna iti samanuśaśāsa-
252:143: suśiṣyavṛttyā śramaṇadvijeṣu pūrve guṇaprema yathā vicakruḥ|
252:144: nṛpāḥ svavṛttyā ca dayāṃ prajāsu kīrtikṣamaḥ sa tridivasya panthāḥ||49||
252:145: adharmamasmād bhṛśadurjayaṃ jayan kadaryabhāvaṃ ca durutaraṃ taran|
252:146: upaihi ratnātiśayojjvalaṃ jvalan divaspateḥ kāñcanagopuraṃ puram||50||
252:149: tvayā hi saddarśanasādhunādhunā narendra vṛttena yiyāsatā satā|
252:150: yadaiva citte guṇarūkṣatā kṣatā tadaiva te mārgakṛtāspadaṃ padam||52||
252:151: kuruṣva tasmād guṇasādhanaṃ dhanaṃ śivāṃ ca loke svahitodayāṃ dayām|
252:152: sthiraṃ ca śīlendriyasaṃvaraṃ varaṃ paratra hi syādaśivaṃ na tena te||53||
252:155: tvamatra sanmānasasārathī rathī sva eva deho guṇasūratho rathaḥ|
252:162: caran parātmārthamamohabhāsvatā na jātu rājannirayaṃ gamiṣyasi||58||
252:163: iti sa mahātmā tasya rājñastadasaddarśanāndhakāraṃ bhāsvarairvacanakiraṇairvyavadhūya prakāśya cāsmai sugatimārgaṃ tatraivāntardadhe|
252:164: atha sa rājā samupalabdhaparalokavṛttāntatattvaḥ pratilabdhasamyagdarśanacetāḥ sāmātyapaurajānapado dānadamasaṃyamaparāyaṇo babhūva|
252:168: evamāsādanāmapi santastaddhitopadeśena pratinudanti kṣamāparicayānna pāruṣyeṇeti satpraśaṃsāyāṃ kṣāmāvarṇe'pi vācyam|
